definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: I think apiculture is first-rate choice.
sentences.chinese: 我认为养蜂就是最佳的选择。

sentences.english: Lenin went up to the house and saw the bee-keeper.
sentences.chinese: 列宁走到房子旁见到了养蜂人。

sentences.english: Beekeepers will naturally deny that they are slave owners who steal the products of the
sentences.chinese: 养蜂人自然会否认自己是偷蜜蜂劳动产品的奴隶主。

sentences.english: The south town of Xixinan, Huizhou district, wins the title " The First Town in Apiculture".
sentences.chinese: “安徽养蜂第一镇”的西溪南镇座落在本区。

sentences.english: He says that there are many different filtering methods used by beekeepers and honey packers.
sentences.chinese: 他说养蜂人和蜂蜜分装工人使用的过滤方法有很多种。

sentences.english: Y. S. Beekeepers of Generations have been dedicated to research and develop the highest quality Bee Products:Y. S.
sentences.chinese: 各代养蜂人一直致力于研究和开发高质量的蜂产品。

sentences.english: My sister was put in charge of the apiary.
sentences.chinese: 我姐姐被派去负责养蜂场。

sentences.english: Bee industry dominant position above all, apiculture " the doorsill is low " , require one-time investment only.
sentences.chinese: 蜂产业优势首先，养蜂“门槛低”，只需一次性投资。

sentences.english: And some beekeeping businesses have failed.
sentences.chinese: 一些养蜂企业遭到打击。

sentences.english: Bee is a sophomore at Appleton North High School.
sentences.chinese: 养蜂是一个大二在阿普尔顿北高中。

sentences.english: The beekeeper's family will then migrate with them to their summer location.
sentences.chinese: 养蜂人的家在那时将会迁移回它们夏天在的那个地方。

sentences.english: Every year, beekeepers will come honey, litchi honey is a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 每年，养蜂人都会赶来采蜜，荔枝蜜是很好的东西。

sentences.english: Apiculture is a potential industry in the future.
sentences.chinese: 在以后，养蜂业是一个有潜力的行业。

sentences.english: It has rich resources and high skill in bee keeping.
sentences.chinese: 蜂业资源非常丰富，养蜂技术力量雄厚。

sentences.english: So the people that should be praised for protecting the honey bees are the beekeepers.
sentences.chinese: 所以人们应该赞扬养蜂人保护蜜蜂这种行为。

sentences.english: China is very rich in bee resources, the development of large-scale beekeeping is imperative.
sentences.chinese: 我国蜜源资源十分丰富，发展规模化养蜂势在必行。

definition: cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
